name: Project I.C.E.
description:
Project I.C.E. (Intense Cryogenic Emissions) is a secret operation organised by Penguins that tests the use of advanced weapons that are designed to freeze things rather than destroy them. It is up to you to test their latest invention: after undergoing a short physical examination in the Antarctic test chambers, you will be the first to test the potential of the I.C.E. gun.

Project I.C.E. was created as part of a University project on gimmicks in platformers.

It is designed to show how much complexity and difficulty can be added to a game when a unique mechanic is introduced (in this case, the I.C.E. gun).
